question: 項目
sourceMnemonic: You need to go through a <kanji>paragraph</kanji> in chunks that you can easily see with your <kanji>eye</kanji> so you break it up by <vocabulary>item</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. Here's a mnemonic to help you out with <ja>目</ja>. If you can't see this <vocabulary>item</vocabulary> in the paragraph with your eye, someone will <reading>mock</reading> (<ja>もく</ja>) you for sure.
